channel.title: [MSN] Spam Script, Nothing special
channel.description:
My very first script in a...Loooog time. Haven't been on in like ages, so I've forgot my old username, and what Email I used. Thought I might as well start fresh on a basic script:
[code]program MyMsnSpamScript; // Names the script
// This is nothing special, just my first // script to use at MSN.
const Message1 = ''; // Type in your message
procedure SendMessage; // A procedure to be called upon later in the script begin writeln(Message1); // Writes the String added to the constant value of Message 1 Wait(100); // Waits for 100 miliseconds before going on end; // Ends the script inside the procedure
begin repeat // Repeats whatever is between "repeat" and "Until();" SendMessage; // Calling upon the procedure "SendMessage", this just makes the Script "Cleaner" Until(IsFKeyDown(12)); // The Script will stop whenever F12 us pushed end. // end with a dot (.) behind, Says that the script has ended, and wont execute anything more.[/code]

item.title: [MSN] Spam Script, Nothing special
item.dc:creator: @Violentypro Violentypro
item.description:
@Violentypro wrote:

My very first script in a…Loooog time.
Haven’t been on in like ages, so I’ve forgot my old username, and what Email I used.
Thought I might as well start fresh on a basic script:

[code]program MyMsnSpamScript; // Names the script

                                                  // This is nothing special, just my first
                                                  // script to use at MSN.

const
Message1 = ‘’; // Type in your message

procedure SendMessage; // A procedure to be called upon later in the script
begin
writeln(Message1); // Writes the String added to the constant value of Message 1
Wait(100); // Waits for 100 miliseconds before going on
end; // Ends the script inside the procedure

begin
repeat // Repeats whatever is between “repeat” and “Until();”
SendMessage; // Calling upon the procedure “SendMessage”, this just makes the Script “Cleaner”
Until(IsFKeyDown(12)); // The Script will stop whenever F12 us pushed
end. // end with a dot (.) behind, Says that the script has ended, and wont execute anything more.[/code]

Read full topic
